name: Warsong Runner Update
tooltip:
Warsong Runner Update

So you're here with my orders? Always good to see a new recruit with an exuberant nature and a strong will.

You'd best learn fast if you expect to keep up here. The threat of the naga grows, <name>. I have observed and have taken up defenses against several attacks on this outpost since I arrived here.

But if you'd like to pitch in with that effort, speak with one of the others here at the outpost.

Requirements:
- Warsong Report
